reviewText:
This is now one of my favorite Christmas programs.  It shows you the true meaning of Christmas.  It is also quite funny at times
Still is one of my favorites.

I especially liked this video because it shows children in not so perfect families at the christmas season. It's Christmas message was especially appealing. For today's world it makes you feel like you're not the only one going through problems at Christmas time. I highly recommend this video to all.
